dmca.title: Pearl Company Asks Google to Delist Blog
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Counter Notification 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

[private]
Pearl Paradise.com
[private]
Santa Monica, CA 90403

Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on my Website at: http://www.pearlparadise.com/blackpearls.html 
I have applied for and received a US copyright for materials on my site.

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

This page contains my copyright work. I have asked the owner to remove it and she has told me she is unable to do so:
http://www.barzey.com/mt-comments.cgi?entry_id=425
Please see post #14. This has been copied in its entirety from my Website. I know that this has been done by my competitors to defame my site.
Google searches that link to this site
pearl paradise
Yesterday the page was on google #1 page for the search "pearl paradise". Today it is on #2.

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred). 

I may be reached at [private]@[private], or at [private]
